name: Woozzle HD
description:
Woozzle HD is a puzzle game which is about finding the right path for crazy marbles. You have to be smart to understand the labyrinth of cross-roads and quickly set the right path for each color marble to it's correct dock. This game brings a steady dose of fresh techniques and puzzles coming at you at all times.

FEATURES
- 135 game levels
- 9 different music themes

GAMEPLAY VIDEO
http://youtu.be/ZsUFpgCHcXU

REVIEWS
